aka: THE DAY OF THE DEAD IS CANCELLED
this_title: ¡Hasta la madre! del Día de los muertos
trans_title: THE DAY OF THE DEAD IS CANCELLED
introduction: An unexpected death brings together the Garcías and San Román. Lidia and Manuel try to maintain the romance, but Francisco lives with them; Lidia is offered a promotion that involves moving to Monterrey. Rosa confronts the memory of her husband while she tries to find a place for Jaime in her life. Both families receive their dead on their day and prepare for a life in which nothing will be the same.
chinese_title: ¡Hasta la madre! del Día de los muertos
